captions.text: Hello everybody, my name is Markiplier
and welcome to Overgrowth, the game where you play a fury little bunny rabbit and you dive, dup, dip, behh..
Dodge, duck, dip, dive and dodge your way through a series of canyons and mountains
and different pillars and cities, to try to escape the evil creatures, also bunnies and maybe wolves
that are trying to kill you with whatever they can get their hands on.
So let’s get into it. I’m going to start with the arena because that’s what I’ve been playing the most so far.
I’ve only got about maybe twenty-five minutes into this thing, but basically you’re a character and it’s all custom
built and you can fight by punching and kicking and it’s all physically based. The damage is all physical so..
Yeah I got him down. He squeaked a little bit before he died.
You want a kick to the balls?
Auww! Why did you do that?
So anyway, there’s two rounds to certain games and then you get up ‘cause you didn’t just get blunt-force trauma to
Did I mention it’s kind of hard?
You can also jump really high.
No! No! I said n.. blahh
I said.. Come on. Stop twirling like a ballerina and kick him.
Don’t kick your own team.. Yeahh you like that? I kicked you when you were down. Good job teammate.
Look at me everybody I have a sword. It’s a fight to the death.
This game actually is kind of brutal. What are you doing?!
Whoa I thought you were my teammate. No! Please, I just want to live!
Aaargh! Ohh ow, okay I’m not dead, they didn’t hit me with the sword.
I’m just going to let them all fight and I’m gonna.. oh oh..
I’m gonna.. you stay away from me! You stay away from me!
You stay away from me! You stay away from me! Auw no!
Aargh my back! You sliced me in half. Auww
You can’t escape my mad moves bro.
My sick moves. Auww what did I do?
Yeah you’re all jealous of my mad skills over here. I’m just bleeding like pretend bleeding.
If you two could stop dancing over there, that would be delightful.
Yaayy. I’m professionally skilled at everything combat.
Excuse me I’m just going to take this body back to my home. You ignore me.
Ignore me man, I just need this.
Excuse me, I.. please.. Can you leave me alone for like two seconds, I need this. I need this!
I need this for something. I need this for stuff and things.
Hello friend, you and I team up and then we do good, okay?
I’m gonna get cha. I’m gonna get cha.
You can’t stop my crouching tiger Kong-Fu tigger bunny style.
Come on. What you gonna do?
What you up to? What you up to over there?
You want some of this? You want some of this? Huh?
What? You want some of this?
Ohh we’re going again? Oh whoops, sorry I forgot.
You messing with me? Walk into my circle over here.
I’m just waiting for the victor to approach me.
Bring it on! Bring it on!
Bring it on, what you just standing there? Wow. Yeah there we go.
I am Neo. I am Neo bunny.
I’m the Energizer bunny. You can’t stop me, I just keep going and going and going and aauww.. I kept going.
Ohh another round. Oh god I was.. Oh no!
That’s what you get for celebrating way too early.
Send you across the freakin’ map bro.
I don't even care if I was disqualified!
Also guys, I learned that you can do THIS.
Oh there's death! It was a delayed death!
There we go! There we go!
Aw no! Oh no-no! Aww hohoho!
He buried his face in the sand he's so embarrased
Who the hell are you? WHO THE HELL ARE YOU?!
AWH I'M GONNA GET YA. I'M GONNA GET YA.
WHAT THE- OWW! WHY? WHY CAN'T-NO!
Stop it! I'm trying to- PLEASE CAN I
Please can I- PLEASE CAN I?
Gonna get ya! Hwoop! Aghhh yeah!
I'll get ya- oh oh the old fashion way
Why are you so tou- WHY ARE YOU SO TOUGH?
You killed my wolf - not this wolf though
This guy's really good - come on
That actually is the most pertinent leap of logic they've - oh, come on!
They get to be behind me?
Why is Wade the last one left?
Wade is the only survivor - Wade died in a a wolf attack, okay
